title: The most spectacular action movie ever made !
review: The movie has it all;  a very good story, action, horror and  a little bit of romance. In a short sense;  The movie has it all.....I must have surly watched this movie at least 35 times and it still excites me, every time I look at it........I would have given it more stars but there was just 10 to give away !My best recommendations !!!
